title: Heavy Furniture Mover Tool Set | Easy To Use Ergonomics Design Furniture Moving Tool Best For Home, Office
description:
Description
Heavy Furniture Mover Tool Set | Easy To Use Ergonomics Design Furniture Moving Tool
Product Details:Product Material: Iron+ABS.Maximum Load Bearing: 150 kg.Ergonomics DesignThe furniture lifting tool allows the furniture to move easily with its own strength.The ergonomic design allows you to lift and move heavy furniture and equipment without pulling your back.Safety Design360-degree rotatable foot pads match the furniture feet and equipment feet which are firmly fixed.Easy to Use and easy to carry.You can quickly and efficiently work.Allows you to move furniture or heavy objects easier.Application: Suitable for sofa, bookcase, table, chair, bed, piano, washer, dryer, refrigerator etc.
